title: 19th-Century Clifftop Escape Overlooking the Mediterranean
description: Exuding Sicilian charm exactly as you’d imagine, you’ll rise each morning to views of the seemingly endless sea from this antique property that fuses the design of an old-world English townhouse with the charismatic style of Sicily. Henry’s House Hotel is the boutique and unique way to experience Syracuse like a local. Indulge in daily buffet-style breakfast, one-time cocktails and snacks for two, welcome bottle of prosecco and a daily-replenished minibar.
offer_address: Via Castello Maniace, 68, 96100 Siracusa SR, Italy

title: Boutique Spa Break with Romantic Three-Course Dinner Included
description: Experience the delightful Sicilian city of Syracuse with a stay at the charming Caiammari Boutique Hotel & Spa. A must-see for Italian aficionados, Syracuse is home to a number of well-preserved Greek and Roman remains and the island of Ortigia, a wonderfully secluded spot with over 2,500 years of history. Included in this relaxing escape is daily breakfast for two, a romantic three-course dinner, plus one pass per person to the luxurious on-site spa, with one massage each and a 10% discount on further treatments.
offer_address: Via Daniele Impellizzeri, snc, 96100 Siracusa SR, Italy
